name: Dipak Mandal
aboutMe: I always focus on continuously enhancing my knowledge, skills, and experience by getting involved in challenging work environments and utilizing them for personal and organizational growth to the best of my ability. I have 1 year of hands-on experience in React, Context-API, Redux, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Tailwind CSS.

name: Megha Maurya
aboutMe: I have creative and artistic nature that inspires me to experiment and build attractive UIs and curiosity forces me to explore new technologies. Also can work independently and has leadership quality work in a team. I love learning and during this project, I gained knowledge on the new framework Tailwind CSS and Integration with backend APIs. I have worked on projects based on React, React Native, Redux, HTML, CSS, and Javascript.

name: Nikhil Gangeri
aboutMe: I am a Backend Developer who is passionate about programming and problem-solving. Exuberant in learning new skills and technologies on a regular basis. Core believer of constant learning. Proactive and initiative-driven. Can work under less or almost zero supervision when allotted a task. Well-versed with technologies like MongoDB, PostgreSQL, ExpressJS, Node JS, Docker, AWS, Git, NGINX, REDIS.
